title: SpaceX and xAI Are Merging Into a Very Silly-Sounding Conglomerate. Take It Seriously
full_text: SpaceX and xAI Are Merging Into a Very Silly-Sounding Conglomerate. Take It Seriously. A social media site, an ISP, the lives of astronauts, and the health of the economy may soon depend on one absurd company.. SpaceX is acquiring xAI. Ever since this merger of two Musk companies became a rumor, crazy numbers like $1.5 trillion started being thrown around when discussing the total valuation of SpaceX, so yo… [+5403 chars]
